sentence: Did you see the whale jump out of the water?

sentence_tra: 我在阳光下看到一只袋鼠。

sentence: When I realized that she was a professional boxer, I regretted picking a fight with her.
sentence_tra: 当我意识到她是一个职业拳击手时，我真后悔挑衅她。

sentence: There's nothing like a cold coke on a hot summer's day.
sentence_tra: 在炎热的夏天，没什么比得上来一杯冰可乐。

sentence: I eat toast for breakfast every day.
sentence_tra: 我每天早餐吃烤面包。

sentence: "Checkmate!" he said as he made his final chess move.
sentence_tra: "将军!"他在移动最后一个棋子时说。

sentence: The finance committee discussed the company's financial plans.
sentence_tra: 财务委员会讨论了公司的财务计划。

sentence: If you learn this martial arts technique, you will be a great fighter.
sentence_tra: 如果你学会这种武术技能，你会成为一名优秀的战士。

mean_cn: n. 尝试, 企图;  vt. 努力去做, 试图, 尝试;
sentence: The cat attempts to catch that fish!
sentence_tra: 那个喵星人试图抓到那条鱼！

sentence: The crowd is waiting for the game to start in the stadium.
sentence_tra: 大家都在体育场内等待比赛开始。

mean_cn: adj.不平常的，少有的；与众不同的
sentence: She has an unusual way of eating. She doesn't use her hands.
sentence_tra: 她吃饭的方式很不寻常――她从不用手！

mean_cn: n.谷物种子，谷物，纹理v.使成粒状
sentence: Grains like wheat are used to make bread.
sentence_tra: 像小麦这样的谷物是用来做面包的。

sentence: Holding a post graduate degree is a matter of honour and pride.
sentence_tra: 拿到硕士学位是一件光荣并值得自豪的事情。

sentence: They chose an underwear model with big muscles.
sentence_tra: 他们选择有大块肌肉的内衣模特。

sentence: This boundary separates my farm from his farm.
sentence_tra: 分界线把我和他的农场分开。

sentence: Give me your money, otherwise I'll kill you.
sentence_tra: 给我你的钱，不然就杀了你。

sentence: I spend my morning playing golf.
sentence_tra: 早上我在打高尔夫球。

sentence: I like to drink fresh lemonade.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢喝新鲜的柠檬水。

mean_cn: n. 领带;  关系;  束缚;  vi. 系;  打结;  打成平局;  vt. 系;  打, 打结;
sentence: I just learned how to tie a necktie around my neck.
sentence_tra: 我刚刚学会系领带。

sentence: We compete against each other to see who's the fastest rider.
sentence_tra: 我们相互竞争为了看看谁是最快的骑手。

sentence: She is delighted that she finished her work.
sentence_tra: 她很高兴她完成了工作。

sentence: I love to be outdoors in the fresh air.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢空气清新的野外。

sentence: What's the significance of this painting?
sentence_tra: 这幅画的含义是什么？

sentence: I have a lot of software on my smart phone.
sentence_tra: 我手机上装了很多软件。

sentence: Cigarettes are getting more expensive every year.
sentence_tra: 香烟的价格都一年比一年贵。

mean_cn: n. 贴标语;  海报, 张贴的大幅广告;
sentence: Let's put a poster up outside to advertise our business.
sentence_tra: 我们在外面贴一张海报给我们的业务做宣传吧。

mean_cn: n. 条;  闩;  障碍;  柜台; 酒吧 vt. 阻挡;  禁止;
sentence: There's no-one drinking in the bar - it's too early.
sentence_tra: 酒吧还没有人喝酒，太早了。

mean_cn: adj. 灵巧的;  娴熟的;
sentence: You're a very skilful juggler!
sentence_tra: 你是一个娴熟的（扔球）杂技人。

sentence: I like to paint my fingernails red because they look pretty.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢涂红色指甲油因为看起来很漂亮。

sentence: I've never met anyone with such intelligence!
sentence_tra: 我从没有见过那么聪明的人！

sentence: Playing fair is too risky, so I cheat.
sentence_tra: 公平地玩风险太大，所以我作弊。

sentence: We are a publisher of academic and technical books.
sentence_tra: 我们是教育类和科技类书籍的出版商。

mean_cn: n. 标识, 徽标, 图标;  标识语;
sentence: This is what I think of whenever I see Papsi's new logo.
sentence_tra: 每当我看到百事的新商标就会想到这样的画面。

mean_cn: adj.全国范围的，全国性的 adv.在全国
sentence: Our newspaper is distributed nationwide all across  China.
sentence_tra: 我们的报纸在全中国范围内派发。

mean_cn: adj. 高兴的, 满意的;  动词please的过去式
sentence: She's very pleased with her boyfriend's kiss.
sentence_tra: 男朋友的吻是她很开心。

sentence: The workers are hired to deal with the garbage.
sentence_tra: 工人们被请来处理这些垃圾。

sentence: Even though it is raining, the little girl wants to play outside.
sentence_tra: 尽管在下雨，但是小女孩还是想去外面玩。

mean_cn: n.诡计，恶作剧，技艺，戏法v.哄骗
sentence: The magic trick involved making a woman float in the air.
sentence_tra: 魔术戏法中有一个是让女人浮在空中。

sentence: Our boss gave us a bonus at the end of the year for working so hard.
sentence_tra: 我的老板为了表彰我一年的辛勤劳动，给了我一笔奖金。

sentence: These pills will cure your sickness.
sentence_tra: 这些药片能治好你的病。

sentence: The salesman persuaded us to buy a car.
sentence_tra: 这个销售员在说服我们俩买辆车。

sentence: Everyone would benefit from more money.
sentence_tra: 钱多了以后每个人都能从中受益。

sentence: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentence_tra: 吸烟会导致肺癌。

sentence: People with mental health problems can go to a psychologist for help.
sentence_tra: 有精神健康问题的人们可以去心理医生那里寻求帮助。

sentence: I don't like the music the youth listen to these days.
sentence_tra: 我不喜欢现在这些青年人听的音乐。

mean_cn: v.更新，使现代化；使靠最近n.更新
sentence: I downloaded an update for my software.
sentence_tra: 我给软件下载了升级包。

mean_cn: n.想象力，设想，爱好adj.昂贵的，花哨的；奇特的；v.想象，希望，迷恋
sentence: The wedding was very fancy; there were flowers everywhere.
sentence_tra: 婚礼很昂贵，到处都摆满了鲜花。

mean_cn: n. 分析;  分解;  分析报告;  梗概;
sentence: Could you write up an analysis of how the market is moving this week?
sentence_tra: 你能写篇关于这周市场如何运作的分析报告吗？

mean_cn: n. 处方;  食谱;  诀窍;
sentence: The little girl followed the recipe to cook the food.
sentence_tra: 这个小女孩儿照着菜谱烹饪。

sentence: The man advertises his business to potential customers.
sentence_tra: 这个男人在为自己的公司做广告来赢取潜在客户。

sentence: She was very good at her job, so her boss promoted her to a higher position.
sentence_tra: 她工作表现很棒，所以她的老板把她升到了更高的位置。

sentence: If you keep smoking tobacco you will damage your body.
sentence_tra: 如果你继续抽烟你会毁了你的身体的。

mean_cn: n.笨蛋，傻瓜　　v.玩弄，愚弄
sentence: The fool had a stupid look on his face.
sentence_tra: 这个傻子一脸愚蠢表情。

sentence: We use our lungs to breathe.
sentence_tra: 我们用肺呼吸。

mean_cn: n. 社团, 公司, 企业;
sentence: Baicizhan is the corporation with great moral and strong work ethic!!!
sentence_tra: 百词斩是一家超有节操和职业道德的公司！！！

mean_cn: v. 瞄准；旨在n. 目标；对准
sentence: Aim a little above the target if you want to hit it.
sentence_tra: 如果你想击中靶子，在瞄准的时候往上一点。

sentence: She worked for the welfare of others.
sentence_tra: 她为他人的幸福而工作。

sentence: Wow! Your dancing is really eye-catching!
sentence_tra: 哇！你的舞蹈很引人注目！

sentence: Each packet of sauce will flavor one meal.
sentence_tra: 每小包酱汁都能让一顿饭更有味道。

sentence: I can not stand my boss's bad breath any more!
sentence_tra: 我再也不能忍受我上司的口臭了！

sentence: These days we get our information from all kinds of different media.
sentence_tra: 如今我们从各种不同的媒体获取信息。

sentence: Let me figure out what I can make for dinner... OK, got it!
sentence_tra: 让我想想我能做什么当晚餐。啊，想到了！

mean_cn: v.起反应，有影响，对......做出反应
sentence: Different people react differently when shown a horror movie.
sentence_tra: 看恐怖电影时不同的人有不同的反应。

mean_cn: n. 座右铭, 格言, 箴言;  口号
sentence: In 2008, "Yes we can" was the Obama campaign's motto.
sentence_tra: "是的,我们能！"是奥巴马在2008年的竞选宣言。

sentence: This item is a best-seller! Everybody wants to buy one!
sentence_tra: 这本是畅销书，大家都想买。

mean_cn: v. 购买；努力取得n. 购买
sentence: I would like to purchase this shirt, please.
sentence_tra: 我要买这件衣服，谢谢。

mean_cn: n. 理解, 领悟;  理解力;  内涵;
sentence: The big question mark implies his poor comprehension.
sentence_tra: 这个大大的问号表明他理解力不够。

mean_cn: adj.年长的；资格老的，地位较高的n.(大学或高中)毕业生
sentence: Senior citizens should be respected.
sentence_tra: 年长的人应该被尊重。

mean_cn: n.倾斜，小费，尖端，建议； 提示；v.轻击；倾斜；给小费；翻倒
sentence: You can use the tip of your pen to push that button.
sentence_tra: 你可以用笔尖戳那个按钮。

sentence: Have you ever seen the moon shine so brightly?
sentence_tra: 你见过如此皎洁的明月吗？

mean_cn: n.洗发精，香波；洗发　v.洗发
sentence: This new shampoo makes my hair smell great!
sentence_tra: 新买的洗发香波使我头发闻上去很不错。

sentence: Fresh pizza is so yummy!
sentence_tra: 新鲜的披萨非常好吃。

sentence: Grocery stores greatly solve our daily purpose.
sentence_tra: 杂货店解决了我们的日常需求。

sentence: The smoker breathed out a cloud of smelly smoke.
sentence_tra: 吸烟者呼出一团有难闻烟味的云雾。

sentence: Yes! I hit the target, right in the center!
sentence_tra: 太好了！我击中了靶子，正中红心！

mean_cn: v. 信以为真；对...倾倒；受……的骗
sentence: She fell for the boy at first sight.
sentence_tra: 她对那个男孩一见倾心。

mean_cn: 开 ... 的玩笑； 捉弄；欺诈
sentence: She is playing a trick on her sleeping friend.
sentence_tra: 她正在捉弄熟睡的朋友。

sentence: Anti-smoking rules are becoming more common.
sentence_tra: 禁烟规矩正在变得更普遍。

mean_cn: n. 呼吸;  气息;  气味;

sentence_tra: 在我们开始运动前，先做一些深呼吸吧。

sentence: I always buy the latest Apple gadgets. Now it's time for iPhone 5!
sentence_tra: 我总是买苹果最新的产品，现在是时候买iPhone 5了！

mean_cn: n.外表，面貌；(问题等的)方面

sentence_tra: 市场营销包括很多不同的方面，比如价格、促销等。

sentence: I recommend this toilet paper - it's better quality.
sentence_tra: 我推荐这种厕纸！它的质量更好。

sentence: This drug will lower your blood pressure.
sentence_tra: 这个药会降低你的血压。

sentence: She appeals to us to promote gender equality at the conference.
sentence_tra: 她在大会上呼吁我们促进性别平等。

mean_cn: n. 注释;  评论;  议论; vi. 作注解;  进行评论; vt. 为…作评语;
sentence: Her friends commented on her post.
sentence_tra: 她的朋友评论了她的状态。

mean_cn: n. 广告;  公告;  广告活动;  宣传;
sentence: I was really interested in the TV show, but now the TV is showing advertisements instead.
sentence_tra: 我本来对这个电视节目很感兴趣，但是现在电视只放广告。

mean_cn: n. 合同;  交易;  便宜货;  vi. 讨价还价, 讲价;  成交;  adj. (价格), 低廉的;  vt. 经讨价还价成交;  用…交换;
sentence: The old lady is trying to bargain with the peddler.
sentence_tra: 老婆婆正试图和小贩讲价。

mean_cn: n. 冲动, 欲望;  vi. 驱策;  力荐;  vt. 力劝, 敦促;  驱策;
sentence: During the race the rider urged the horse to go faster so he could win.
sentence_tra: 在比赛中，骑手为了赢得胜利，不断鞭策他的马加快速度。

mean_cn: n. 航空公司;  航空系统;  (飞机的)航线;  adj. 航空公司的;  在航线上的;

sentence_tra: 这家航空公司只带你飞去驾驶员想去的地方！

mean_cn: n. 散文, 随笔, 文章;
sentence: I'm a merit student and I like writing essays. Bravo!
sentence_tra: 我是学霸我爱写论文。赞！

mean_cn: n. 奴隶;  苦工;  vi. 奴隶般地工作, 苦干;
sentence: The Africans were taken to be slaves.
sentence_tra: 非洲人曾被当作奴隶。

sentence: The design for the house looks great--now let's build it!
sentence_tra: 这个房子的设计很棒，现在我们来建造它吧！

sentence: I will determine which option is better.
sentence_tra: 我将决定哪一个选项更好。

sentence: The teacher wants to get the idea across to his students.
sentence_tra: 老师想把自己的想法传达给学生。

sentence: One bite from a poisonous snake could kill you.
sentence_tra: 被毒蛇咬一口就能要你的命。

sentence: She consults her doctor to find out what she should do about the pain.
sentence_tra: 她咨询她的医生去找出治疗她疼痛的方法。

mean_cn: n. 设计者, 设计师;  adj. 由设计师专门设计的;  标明设计师姓名的;  赶时髦的, 流行的;

sentence_tra: 当我们想为公司创建一个标志的时候，我们请了一名图形设计师。

sentence: 10 multiplied by 8 is 80.
sentence_tra: 10乘以8等于80。

sentence: Do you remember your first music CD?
sentence_tra: 你记得你的第一张音乐光盘吗？

sentence: She was amazed at the size of the diamond, but she didn't really want to marry him.
sentence_tra: 她被钻石的尺寸惊到了，但她不想嫁给他。

sentence: Many people came to support the president's campaign.
sentence_tra: 很多人都来这儿支持总统的竞选活动。

sentence: The company had a "SMARTER" slogan it liked to use.
sentence_tra: 这家公司有一个他们爱用的口号叫“机灵点儿”。

mean_cn: adj. 单纯的；清白无辜的
sentence: The baby is still innocent--he knows nothing of the evils of the world.
sentence_tra: 这个婴儿仍然单纯无知，不了解世上的丑恶。
